mapper.select: select apr_id, af_id, emp_id, apr_receivedate, apr_title, apr_content, apr_status, apr_comment, apr_signdate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(approval approval_pk) */ rownum rn, apr_id, af_id, emp_id, apr_receivedate, apr_title, apr_content, apr_status, apr_comment, apr_signdate from approval where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount} and apr_status = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into approval (apr_id, af_id, emp_id, apr_receivedate, apr_title, apr_content, apr_status, apr_signdate) values(approval_seq.nextval,#{af_id},#{emp_id},sysdate ,#{apr_title},#{apr_content},'0',sysdate)
mapper.select: select apr_id, af_id, emp_id, apr_receivedate, apr_title, apr_content, apr_status, apr_comment, apr_signdate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(approval approval_pk) */ rownum rn, apr_id, af_id, emp_id, apr_receivedate, apr_title, apr_content, apr_status, apr_comment, apr_signdate from approval where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.update: update approval set apr_status = #{apr_status}, apr_comment = #{apr_comment}, apr_signdate = sysdate where apr_id = #{apr_id}
